channel.title: addSkillXP(-(c.playerXP[j]) , j);
channel.description:
I'm trying to script in the event of a player death, he will loose all of his skill levels.
It's strange because in other parts of the same class c.playerXP is called and there is no problem then.
[img]http://s13.postimg.org/q6d7xcg4n/error_1.png[/img]
Thanks for your assistance.
(I'm really fucking tired please don't be harsh if I'm being retarded)
